title: The Sixth day of creation
creator_credit: Francis Maziere, Theodora Olembert and Triangle Productions
brief_description: On the sixth day God created Man and Beast, and since then the law of the jungle has reigned supreme. All species feed on other forms of life: none of them good or evil - just struggling to survive. The strong shall eat the weak - there is no appeal.
creator_credit_for_label: Francis Maziere, Theodora Olembert and Triangle Productions
